select * from module_p m left join
(select module_id p_id,name p_name from module_p) p
on m.parent_id=p.p_id order by order_no

select * from (select * from module_p where module_id=#{moduleId}) m left join
(select module_id p_id,name p_name from module_p) p
on m.parent_id=p.p_id
mapper.update: update module_p set parent_id=#{parentModule.moduleId}, name=#{name}, ctype=#{ctype}, state=#{state}, order_no=#{orderNo}, remark=#{remark}, update_by=#{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time=#{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE} where module_id=#{moduleId}
